title: Did Rush Limbaugh Say This About Liberal vs. Conservative Views on Compassion?
subtitle: The statement was part of an updated list of "35 undeniable truths" presented on Rush Limbaugh's radio show in February 1994.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Rush Limbaugh once said, “Liberals measure compassion by how many people are given welfare. Conservatives measure compassion by how many people no longer need it.”
